description: Creates a service principal name (SPN) for the service account in Active Directory. Kerberos authentication uses SPNs to associate a service instance with a service sign-in account.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Idempotency token. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: ConnectorArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that was returned when you called CreateConnector.

parameters.name: DirectoryRegistrationArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that was returned when you called CreateDirectoryRegistration.
